title: N172 Old Judge want to buy/trade-Wright
author: Tswlaw

posts.post_title: N172 Old Judge want to buy/trade-Wright
posts.post_content:
Down, to my last three in the HOF subset. Need a N172 Harry Wright, any condition. Been at this challenge for 34 years! The tough ones left. 

I have doubles of a few I would be willing to trade! Thanks in advance.

PM please.

Hi Tslaw

I don’t have a spare Wright but I thought you might want to join our Old Judge Collectors Group on Facebook. 

A bunch of us OJC guys have gotten together to learn, share snd B/S/T to grow our collections. You might find someone willing to trade or sell on our site.

Send me a message on Messenger Or an email and I can help get you signed up

Ken Rhodes

[url]rhodeskenm@gmail.com[/url] on email
